name: Football Manager 2014
description:
Football Manager 2014 is a strategy-sports game developed by Hardlight and Little Stone Software. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by SEGA. On review aggregator Metacritic, Football Manager 2014 has a score of 85. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Football Manager 2014 on PC.
It was produced by Miles Jacobson.
